title: Accounting for trade in derived products when estimating European Union's role in driving deforestation
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 224

Author(s): Perrine C.S.J. Laroche, Manuela Gómez-Suárez, U. Martin Persson, Florence Pendrill, Florian Schwarzmueller, Catharina J.E. Schulp, Thomas Kastner
